data.title: Generative UI Case Studies - Real-World AI Interface Applications
data.snippet:
Visit Siteüí°Cases

#### Vercel AI SDK - Generative UI

Vercel's AI SDK enables streaming React components from LLMs, allowing AI to generate interactive UI components in real-time.

vercelreactstreaming

by Vercel

Visit Siteüí°Cases

#### bracesproul/gen-ui - LangChain.js Generative UI Demo

An open-source demo project built with LangChain.js and Next.js for demonstrating how to quickly build Generative UI applications. The project description states: "This app is intended to provide a template for building Generative UI applications using LangChain.js".

langchainnextjsopen-source

by bracesproul

Visit Site [...] ‚ú®

# Awesome Generative UI

üåü HomeüìÑ Papersüí° Casesüé¨ Videosüìö Resourcesüí¨ Discussions

# Generative UI Case Studies - Real-World AI Interface Applications

Explore real-world Generative UI implementations: Google Gemini Dynamic View, Vercel v0, Amazon Rufus, and more. See how companies are using AI to generate dynamic, personalized user interfaces.

6 items

üí°Cases

#### Google Gemini 3 - Dynamic View & Visual Layout [...] by Google ¬∑ 2025-11

Visit Siteüí°Cases

#### v0 by Vercel

Vercel's v0.dev (beta since 2023) can convert short text prompts into interactive frontend prototypes. It generates React/Tailwind UI components from text descriptions or images, demonstrating the prospect of text-to-UI generation.

vercelcode-generationreact

by Vercel ¬∑ 2023-10

Visit Siteüí°Cases

#### Amazon Rufus - Conversational Shopping Assistant

Amazon launched the conversational shopping assistant "Rufus", which directly generates intent-based interfaces (such as product recommendation cards, filter options, etc.) through conversation, breaking through the traditional keyword search model.

amazonrufuse-commerce

by Amazon ¬∑ 2024-02

Visit Siteüí°Cases

data.title: langchain-ai/langgraph: Build resilient language agents as graphs.
data.snippet:
print(graph.compile().invoke({"text": ""}))
# {'text': 'ab'}
undefined

Get started with the LangGraph Quickstart.

To quickly build agents with LangChain's `create_agent` (built on LangGraph), see the LangChain Agents documentation.

Core benefits

.
   Reference: Detailed reference on core classes, methods, how to use the graph and checkpointing APIs, and higher-level prebuilt components.
   Examples: Guided examples on getting started with LangGraph.
   LangChain Forum: Connect with the community and share all of your technical questions, ideas, and feedback.
   LangChain Academy: Learn the basics of LangGraph in our free, structured course.
   Case studies: Hear how industry leaders use LangGraph to ship AI applications at scale.

Acknowledgements

data.title: Josh Coyne's Post - LinkedIn
data.snippet:
# Josh Coyne‚Äôs Post

Josh Coyne

 Report this post

If you're a founder and looking for an effusive reaction to your new AI product, you know who to call... In all seriousness, congrats Brace Sproul & the LangChain team on an epic new product launch!

LangChain

482,296 followers

LangSmith Agent Builder is generally available üéâ It‚Äôs surprisingly easy to build agents now. Most work automation tools make you configure every step. As soon as the job evolves, you spend hours remapping and debugging the workflow. We took a different approach: ‚úÖ You build using everyday language. ‚úÖ It gets better by using memory to learn from your feedback. ‚úÖ You stop babysitting if/then workflows. Even a VC can do it‚Ä¶üëá Try Agent Builder free:  Read the announcement:
